data.name: welcome
data.comment: Short heading shown on the home page.

data.name: welcomeMessage
data.value: Welcome to the app. Please proceed to the registration form.
data.comment: Introductory message on the home page.

data.name: goToRegister
data.comment: Button text: navigates to the registration page.

data.name: registerTitle
data.comment: Title of the registration form page.

data.name: labelPersonalNumber
data.comment: Label for the personal number input field.

data.name: phPersonalNumber
data.value: YYYYMMDD-XXXX or YYMMDD-XXXX or11 digits or9-12 alphanumeric
data.comment: Placeholder text for personal number entry format examples.

data.name: labelFirstName
data.comment: Label for the first name input field.

data.name: phFirstName
data.comment: Placeholder text for first name input.

data.name: labelLastName
data.comment: Label for the last name input field.

data.name: phLastName
data.comment: Placeholder text for last name input.

data.name: labelPhone
data.comment: Label for the phone number input field.

data.name: phPhone
data.comment: Example phone number placeholder (US format).

data.name: btnSubmit
data.comment: Submit button text.

data.name: btnClear
data.comment: Clear/reset button text.

data.name: alertSubmitTitle
data.comment: Alert title shown when the form is successfully submitted.

data.name: alertValidationTitle
data.comment: Alert title shown when validation fails.

data.name: settingsTitle
data.comment: Title of the settings page.

data.name: settingsTheme
data.comment: Label for the theme selection setting.

data.name: settingsLanguage
data.comment: Label for the language selection setting.

data.name: optionSystemDefault
data.comment: Option text to use the system's default setting.

data.name: optionLight
data.comment: Option text for light theme.

data.name: optionDark
data.comment: Option text for dark theme.

data.name: optionEnglish
data.comment: Option text for English language.

data.name: optionSwedish
data.comment: Option text for Swedish language.

data.name: optionGerman
data.comment: Option text for German language.

data.name: userTitle
data.comment: Title of the user registration page

data.name: user
data.comment: Title of the user page.

data.name: navHome
data.comment: Flyout menu: Home

data.name: navRegister
data.comment: Flyout menu: Register

data.name: navUser
data.comment: Flyout menu: User

data.name: navViewProfile
data.comment: Flyout header subtitle
